==== Notes ====
* For the wireless to work, you nedd the restricted-modules
* For the battery applet status to work, I do: modprobe -r battery && modprobe battery && /etc/init.d/dbus restart
You need to reload the applet, and it' s ok...If someone know a better way to make it work...
